SB Nation reviews: Mewtwo - Zito Madu wrote an awesome piece on Mewtwo that you should definitely read

Johto Times - an awesome Pokémon-focused newsletter published every Thursday. If you were a fan growing up in the late 90s and early 2000s, you’ll love the nostalgia kick.
